snippet.title: Expeditions: Rome - Death or Glory | Trailer [GOG]
snippet.description:
✅ Link to the game 👉  https://bit.ly/3E7hd3b

Don the armor of a gladiator and enter the arena with your praetorian guard to win fame and fortune. Introducing the Gladiator character class to Expeditions: Rome, this DLC offers a new way to experience the game’s branching story through the 3 new gladiator sub-classes: as a tough and heavily armored Murmillo, a highly mobile and cunning Retiarius, or a morale-manipulating Provocator.

Follow us on:
Web: 👉  https://bit.ly/3rpVmMh
Twitch: 👉  https://bit.ly/3vVI6CJ
Twitter: 👉  https://bit.ly/3fdOUFK
Facebook: 👉  https://bit.ly/2NWKVCw
